plot: A woman opens up her home and heart to a man. When she discovers that he's been deceiving her. She seeks revenge by torturing him physically and emotionally.
title: Emotions
plot_es: A woman opens up her home and heart to a man. When she discovers that he's been deceiving her. She seeks revenge by torturing him physically and emotionally.
plot_en: A woman opens up her home and heart to a man. When she discovers that he's been deceiving her. She seeks revenge by torturing him physically and emotionally.
